mapper.insert: insert into freereply(bno, rno, reply, replyId, replyPw) VALUES(#{bno}, freereply_seq.nextval, #{reply}, #{replyId}, #{replyPw})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM freereply WHERE bno = 303 ORDER BY rno DESC) a ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount} AND rn <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}
select replyPw from freereply where rno = #{rno}
mapper.update: UPDATE freereply SET reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno} and replyPw = #{replyPw}
mapper.delete: delete freereply where rno = #{rno} and replyPw = #{replyPw}
mapper.select: select count(*) as result from freereply where rno = #{rno} and replyPw = #{replyPw}
